LongDescription: Heavy civilian drive for cargo vessels, with increased power output at the expense of thrust power.
FlavorText:
Blaze of Glory 2MC - WRISTCOMP BULLETIN
- SCPO Gibson

DO NOT LOITER ON THE CATWALKS OF THE BW2000

I know you guys are gearheads and love to kill time around the drive but the catwalks are for maintenance cycles and drive teams to have an easier time working, they are NOT there for you to browse the StellarNet on your wristcomps or gab about the latest Slam Kings game while you get in everybody's way. The BW2000 is dangerous and not something to just mill about with like a bunch of bloody tourists.

Time and time again, I have to tell off someone playing cards under the radial overhang and look, I get it, I know it's a comfy spot to sit under when we're idling but you are REMINDED that the radial is the first thing to go during a drive failure and WILL shower the whole overhang with spears of metal when the turbine blows because you guys won't let maintenance do their damn jobs! Get it through your thick heads already!

This is a 10-metre high, heavyweight drive unit! Stop using it like the mess deck and get back to work! NOW!
FormattedBuffs:

Linear Thrust: <color=#FF2525>-15%</color>
